message.content:
cs.DM, cs.GT, cs.CC, cs.DS, cs.IT

Reasoning: The paper deals with an extremal problem in coloring hypergraphs, which is a topic in discrete mathematics (cs.DM). It also involves graph theory (cs.GT) and combinatorics (cs.CC). The study of maximum number of properly colored hyperedges involves analyzing the structure of the hypergraph, which is related to data structures (cs.DS). Finally, the paper also discusses the information theory aspects of the problem, such as the entropy of the coloring, which is related to information theory (cs.IT).
